titles.title: Hymn 117 - Come Reveal Thyself O Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, reveal Thyself O Lord,
Come, our hearts teach to knoweth Thee
Invigorate all our hearts
Bless us now before we go

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come, give our souls lasting rest
Come, make us blessed souls
Come, and speak peace to us Lord
Come, and help our unbelief

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come, dispel doubts in our hearts
Teach us how to approach Thee,
Come, and pour love into our hearts
Come, and raise our fainting hearts

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Come, and make our hearts rejoice,
Speak to us, Thee I do choose
Come, to keep us Thy flock safe
Come, and bless all Thy loved sheep
